articles.description: Those who have children at the £21,000-a-year Lambrook School near Ascot believe their 52 acre slice of idylic Berkshire countryside could be transformed when the three royal children attend.
articles.content: Fearful parents at the 'sweet and laid-back' school where Prince William and Kate will send Prince George, Princess Charlotte and Prince Louis think they will see lots of security, it has been report… [+25787 chars]

articles.author: Josh Luckhurst
articles.title: Ozzy Osbourne confirms he is moving back to UK as everything is 'ridiculous' in the US - The Mirror
articles.description: Black Sabbath frontman Ozzy Osbourne is set to up sticks and return to his homeland with wife Sharon after spending the best past of the last two decades in California
articles.content:
Ozzy Osbourne is set to permanently return to the UK with wife Sharon after several years living in Los Angeles.
